mapper.select: select count(*) from view_memberlist where fk_team_idx = #{fk_team_idx} and ${colname} like '%'|| #{search} ||'%'
select A.idx, A.name from tbl_team A join tbl_member B on A.fk_member_idx = B.idx where A.fk_member_idx = #{fk_member_idx} order by A.idx desc

select C.idx, C.name from tbl_member A join tbl_teamwon B on A.idx = B.fk_member_idx join tbl_team C on B.fk_team_idx = C.idx where B.fk_member_idx = #{fk_member_idx} and B.status = 1 order by C.idx desc
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_team values(seq_team.nextval, #{fk_member_idx}, #{name}, #{tel1}, #{tel2}, #{tel3}, #{post1}, #{post2}, #{addr1}, #{addr2}, 'default.jpg', default, null, 1)
